actionTabobject

debug.t[118]

Superclass
Tree

Property
Summary

Summary

Details

Method
Details

The actionTab object holds a table providing the names (as strings) corresponding to the various Action objects, for use with the DEBUG ACTIONS option. **`actionTab`**` :   `[`PreinitObject`](../object/PreinitObject.html)

Superclass Tree   (in declaration order)

actionTab
PreinitObject
ModuleExecObject
`                         object`

symbolToVal (val)

debug.t[124]

To return the string val corresponding to the Action val, simply look it up in out ctab table
